name: Liminal Season
description: Santa Claus was preparing for the next Christmas Eve, stress was reaching an all time high and he was feeling pretty dizzy and disconcerted. After a well-deserved power nap, Santa Claus wakes up to a weird liminal dimension. Only thing he understands is there are some stockings he needs to deliver to a “special house”. You have to control Santa and help him solve this puzzle in the unsettling neighborhood of the Liminal Season...
